verses.text: \w The|strong="H1732"\w* heavens declare \w the|strong="H1732"\w* glory \w of|strong="H4210"\w* God; \w the|strong="H1732"\w* skies proclaim \w the|strong="H1732"\w* work \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w His|strong="H1732"\w* hands.
Day after day \w they|strong="H5608"\w* pour \w forth|strong="H5608"\w* speech; night after night \w they|strong="H5608"\w* reveal knowledge.

\w Without|strong="H3117"\w* speech \w or|strong="H3117"\w* language, \w without|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sound \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* heard,\f + \fr 19:3 \ft Or There is no speech or language where their voice is not heard\f*

\w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \f + \fr 19:4 \ft LXX, Syriac, and Vulgate; Hebrew their measuring line\f* \w has|strong="H1697"\w* gone out \w into|strong="H1697"\w* \w all|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* earth, \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* ends \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* world.\f + \fr 19:4 \ft Cited in Romans 10:18\f* \w In|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* heavens \w He|strong="H1697"\w* \w has|strong="H1697"\w* pitched \w a|strong="H3068"\w* tent \w for|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* sun.

\w Like|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bridegroom \w emerging|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* chamber, \w like|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* champion rejoicing \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w run|strong="H7097"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* course,

\w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w rises|strong="H3318"\w* \w at|strong="H3318"\w* \w one|strong="H1931"\w* \w end|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1368"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* heavens \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w runs|strong="H7323"\w* \w its|strong="H3318"\w* circuit \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* other; nothing \w is|strong="H1931"\w* deprived \w of|strong="H1368"\w* \w its|strong="H3318"\w* warmth.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* Law \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H4161"\w* perfect, reviving \w the|strong="H5921"\w* soul; \w the|strong="H5921"\w* testimony \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H4161"\w* trustworthy, making wise \w the|strong="H5921"\w* simple.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* precepts \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3068"\w*, \w bringing|strong="H7725"\w* joy \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w*; \w the|strong="H3068"\w* commandments \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* radiant, giving light \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* eyes.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* fear \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w pure|strong="H1249"\w*, enduring forever; \w the|strong="H3068"\w* judgments \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w true|strong="H3068"\w*, \w being|strong="H3068"\w* altogether \w righteous|strong="H3477"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* more precious \w than|strong="H3068"\w* gold, \w than|strong="H3068"\w* much \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* gold; \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* sweeter \w than|strong="H3068"\w* honey, \w than|strong="H3068"\w* honey \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* comb.
\w By|strong="H2091"\w* them indeed \w Your|strong="H2530"\w* servant \w is|strong="H2091"\w* warned; \w in|strong="H7227"\w* keeping them \w is|strong="H2091"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* reward.
\w Who|strong="H5650"\w* \w can|strong="H5650"\w* discern \w his|strong="H8104"\w* own errors? Cleanse \w me|strong="H8104"\w* \w from|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* hidden faults.

Keep \w Your|strong="H5641"\w* servant also \w from|strong="H5352"\w* willful sins; \w may|strong="H4310"\w* they not rule over \w me|strong="H5641"\w*. Then I \w will|strong="H4310"\w* be \w blameless|strong="H5352"\w* \w and|strong="H5352"\w* \w cleansed|strong="H5352"\w* \w of|strong="H5352"\w* great transgression.

\w May|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* words \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H5650"\w* mouth \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* meditation \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H5650"\w* heart \w be|strong="H1571"\w* pleasing \w in|strong="H7227"\w* \w Your|strong="H1571"\w* sight, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H5650"\w* Rock \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H5650"\w* Redeemer.
